thread.title: Here's the most important thing a parent can teach their kids to set them up for financial success
thread.title_full: Here's the most important thing a parent can teach their kids to set them up for financial success

author: Joe Avella and Tanza Loudenback
title: Here's the most important thing a parent can teach their kids to set them up for financial success
text:
" Make Your Kid a Money Genius (Even If You're Not): A Parents' Guide for Kids 3 to 23 " author Beth Kobliner came by Business Insider and told us the best traits you should teach your kids . Here Kobliner emphasizes the importance of teaching your kids delayed gratification. Watch Kobliner's full Facebook live interview below:
